entry.title: $2275 // Brand new renovated 1 Bedroom is ◘◘◘ FANTASTIC! Huge Bedroom
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 20665
1 Bed / 1 Bath in PLG: Prospect Lefferts Gardens, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Sterling St (2, 5), Nostrand Av (2, 3, 4, 5). Brand new renovated 1 Bedroom is FANTASTIC! Huge Bedroom, High ceilings, hardwood floors, lots of closet space, HUGE & BRIGHT windows in every single room, stainless steel appliances, washer/dryer & dishwasher make this place a must-see space!

AMENITIES
Hardwood Floors
Elevator
Natural Light in Living Area
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher
High Ceilings
